root: ^When you stop at a station to refuel and restock, you pick up several dozen more elites. As you set off to your next destination, several of the elites have started to set up for an auction they will hold during the flight, with some of the proceeds going to charity. Many of them are also excited for the next tourist spot: a safari on an alien world, where they will have the opportunity to hunt exotic and dangerous creatures.

^Luckily, no one seems to notice Beckett's absence. You have insured that it will remain that way by making note that Beckett got off at the pit stop and didn't get back on.  A few hours into the flight, it becomes apparent that the clones have gotten word of this, as you receive a transmission. It is the clones, and as one of them, Beckett's clone, starts speaking, you can tell that he sounds pleased.

^"We have heard that Beckett has 'disembarked.' Good work. As promised, you will find credits added to your account as compensation. Continue doing as we have asked, and this will be but a drop in the bucket." Right as the transmission cuts out, you receive notice that 100 credits have been added to your account.
